name: Blazing Fist
description:
This is a game made by me, Pedro Longo. I've also designed the sprites and animations. I only used different sprites for the background and environment that I took from a free asset package from the store: Cyberpunk Street Environment | 2D Building | Unity Asset Store

3D Scene game. Player will move with arrows or "ASD" and will hit with 'Z'. Enemies have a built AI that will pursue and attack the player whenever the player enters their field of view. Boss has a trigger that will slow down the game and finish the level.
